mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_AGREE_STATE, MEMBER_SIGN_UP, MEMBER_PW_MODIFIED) VALUES (MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAgreeState}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO MEMBER_LOG (MEMBER_LOG_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_LOG_SIGN_IN) VALUES (MEMBER_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
